diagrams.description: A mindmap showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Web Development.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
mindmap root((Web
Development)) Definition Building websites and web apps Front-end and back-end Front-End HTML Structure Semantic markup CSS Styling Responsive design Frameworks (Bootstrap, Tailwind) JavaScript Interactivity DOM manipulation Frameworks (React, Vue, Angular) Back-End Server-Side Languages Python (Django, Flask) JavaScript (Node.js) PHP Ruby (Rails) Java Databases SQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL) NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) APIs REST GraphQL WebSockets Full Stack Integration DevOps Architecture Technologies Version Control Git GitHub/GitLab Build Tools Webpack Vite Package Managers npm yarn Testing Unit tests Integration tests E2E tests Best Practices Clean Code Documentation Security HTTPS Input validation Authentication Performance Optimization Caching Accessibility SEO Deployment Hosting Cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) Shared hosting CI/CD Automated deployment Monitoring Analytics Error tracking
